title: ARK mod加载导致非正常退出
author: 白早川
txt_content:
下面是log：

[01:00:09] [Client thread/INFO] [STDOUT]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a:571]: #@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# D:\Firefox download\HMCL-3.3.172\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2020-08-22_01.00.07-server.txt
[01:00:09] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Waiting for the server to terminate/save.
[01:00:12] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Nether
[01:00:12] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/The End
[01:00:15] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 0
[01:00:15] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension -1
[01:00:15] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 1
[01:00:15] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Applying holder lookups
[01:00:15] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Holder lookups applied
[01:00:15] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: The state engine was in incorrect state SERVER_STOPPING and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.
[01:00:15] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Server terminated.
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
不打mod玩1.8没问题，打了ARKCraft之后不能成功进游戏，进去了也是不显示任何方块，有UI但屏幕内容是空的，然后就非正常退出游戏了。
另外，我试了试老版本的ARKCraft，也一样的问题。
目前确定了启动器应该没影响，我保存了.Minecraft原生文件夹，出错误就替换掉出了问题的.Minecraft。目前用的HCML仍然解决不了问题。
（顺带一提，之前的Java32位没成功，换了64位的仍然不行）
新人第一次发帖，如有违规请指出，我立刻删除。
